yamak gana "ek paththak witharak gena" kathandarayak nirmanaya kara, minisunta mulu lokayata ma eya ma witharak penwamin, eya ma pamanak athi bawa dharanaya karamin, nawatha nawathath eya ma karamin yana wita eya pitastharayinge sith thula aththak bawata path wanne ee widihatayi.

paladayitha prawardhana amathyanshaya, jathika paladayitha lekam karyalaya saha aasiyanu paladayitha sanwidhanaya ekwa sanwidhanaya kala me sandaha bangladeshaya, kambojaya, chinaya, fiji, indiyawa, indunisiyawa, iranaya, japanaya, koriyawa, malesiyawa, mongoliyawa, nepalaya, pakisthanaya, pilipinaya, singappuruwa, thayilanthaya ha wiyatnamaya yana ratawala niyojithayo sahabhagi wethi.loka bankuwe da sahaya athiwa sanwidhanaya karana me sasiwaraya ada (23) awasan weyi.mehidi wadi duratath adahas pala kala ee mahatha, pasugiya dashaka thunaka kalayak anathurudayaka ratak bawata pathwa thibu shri lankawa ada me kalapaye ithama samakami rata bawata pathwa thibena bawa ki sarath amunugama mahatha paladayithawaya wadidiyunu kirima wenuwen sadhaniya piyawara rasak gena thibena bawada adhyapana ha thakshanika kshethraye sidukara athi sanwardhanaya paladayithawa wadikara ganimata rukulak wi thibena bawada kiweya.me hethuwen tharangakarithwaya athin apata sapeksha washayen wasiyak athkara ganimata hakiwa thibena bawa ki amathiwaraya paladayithawa sambandhayen meya ithama thiranathmaka sadhakayak bawada batahira ratawal ha sansandanaya karana kala chinaya, indiyawa ha shri lankawa wani aasiyathika ratawal idiriyen sitina bawada penwa dunneya.dala deshiya nishpadithaya pilibanda salaka balana kala yuda gatum hethuwen winashayata path uthuru ha nangenahira palath idiriyen sitina bawada paladayithawa wadidiyunu kirimen aarthika wardhanayak athikara ganimen pamanak apa sahimata path nowana bawada ki ee mahatha samaja sadharanaya wadagath bawada prakasha kaleya.mehidi andahas dakwamin paladayitha prawardhana amathi bashir segudawud mahatha sandahan kale mahinda chinthana prathipaththiya yatathe ape rata wishala sanwardhanayakata lakwa thibena bawath aarthika ha samajayiya washayen wishala sanwardhanayak laba thibena bawathya.

kashmira gatuma saha ehi ithihasaya muslim bahutharayak wesena kashmirayata ayithiya kiyana indiyawa saha pakisthanaya wisin ehi kotas palanaya karanu labayi. 1989 wasare sita me dakwa kashmiraya thula maragena marena prahara dahayak pamana siduwa athi athara, ee sandaha motar rathayak bhawitha kala dewana awasthawa brahaspathinda ella kala praharayayi. 2002 wasaredi jammu nagaraya aasannaye hamuda mulasthanayakata ella wu praharayen 31 denek miya giyaha.
